summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for transportation charges incurred on November 1, 2004. The total amount due is $32.30, with a payment deadline of November 23, 2004. The invoice details the charges, discounts, and shipment information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the invoice for transportation services provided by FedEx.

persons.name: Cecilia Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Cecilia Jeffrey Epstein is also listed as an account holder associated with the invoice.

events.title: FedEx Shipment
events.description: A shipment was picked up by FedEx on November 1, 2004, for which the invoice was generated.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6943
keyFacts: The invoice is dated November 8, 2004, and is for transportation charges totaling $32.30.
The payment is due by November 23, 2004.
The invoice includes a discount of $0.90 applied to the total charges.
The shipment was picked up on November 1, 2004.
Cecilia Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as an account holder alongside Jeffrey Epstein.
